Package org.lwjgl.bullet

Class B3VRControllerEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bullet.B3VRControllerEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class B3VRControllerEvent
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct b3VRControllerEvent {
     int m_controllerId;
     int m_deviceType;
     int m_numMoveEvents;
     int m_numButtonEvents;
     float m_pos[4];
     float m_orn[4];
     float m_analogAxis;
     float m_auxAnalogAxis[MAX_VR_ANALOG_AXIS * 2];
     int m_buttons[MAX_VR_BUTTONS];
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • B3VRControllerEvent

        public B3VRControllerEvent​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a B3VRControllerEvent instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
